DOC.detailed_description: Patients enrol study receive pemetrexed 500mg/m2 , every 21 day , presence progressive disease unacceptable toxicity . All patient take dexamethasone 3.75 mg twice daily , start day continue day drug administration . Patients instructed take oral folic acid 400 mg daily begin 5 day first therapy final therapy.Patients receive Vitamin B12 3 cycle chemoherapy .
